name: filely-ssh-sftp-clinet
description: A clean and modern ssh and sftp client for windows, macos and linux

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . filely --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=assets/icons/windows.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=Filely --version-string.FileDescription=Filely --version-string.ProductName="Filely Client SSH and SFTP"

author: Alexander Mandera, Robin Schleser & ilou
